name: SkullO
description:
Made for BTP #3

My friend has done all the coding while I was doing the art sadly we couldn't utilize the entire week of work on the game thus the UI and LVL design have suffered but we are happy with the result as a demo/concept.

Controls/Tutorial

- Move: W,A,S,D

- Dash: SPACE
- Shoot: MOUSE
- In Each level you have to kill all enemies
- After you finish level you will be given a choice of 5 items
- For every item you take, you will get one less next round
- Each round enemies are stronger, and you get better items

Music in the game was sourced and it was free to use
